Name: Night Shade
Effect: Roll Ghost-Type Damage Dice according to the User's Rank: Starter/1 Die; Rookie/2 Dice; Standard/4 Dice; Advanced/6 Dice; Expert/8 Dice; Ace or higher/10 Dice. Ignore Defenses.
Description: The user casts a dark and frightening mirage surrounding the foe to give them a panic attack.
